import React from "react"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => { return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}

Deepa Devangmath

Architect | Urban Designer | Interior Specialist

{/* Main Content */}

Introduction

I am a licensed architect from India, currently in my ninth year of studying architecture. My re- search delves into how space impacts human behavior and, in turn, their mental well-being. My de- sign philosophy centers on creating harmony between context, built form, and users. I have actively collaborated on various live projects and take great interest in conducting case studies of thought- fully designed spaces, focusing on their construction methods, material choices, and zoning strat- egies. I strongly believe that collaboration, empathy, and attentive listening are key to developing meaningful architectural solutions.

{/* Timeline Section */}

Experience

  • 2018 - 2019

    Rukmini Architects / Office Intern

    I spearheaded the renovation of a public garden, developed Mughal-style concepts for an interior project, prepared working drawings for multiple interior projects, and designed a market outlet.

  • 2020 - 2023

    Home Square Group / Junior Architect

    Collaborated with multiple agencies and led the design and site supervision of six co-housing projects, including structural details, with one project being an old-age home community.

  • 2023 Feb - July

    M.G Studio / Office Intern

    Collaborated on a restaurant project, concentrating on the fabrication details and integrating the built environment with the central courtyard.
    Led a landscape project to rejuvenate an abandoned backyard into an interactive party space, incorporating a water feature as a tranquil element.
    Collaborated on a resort project, where I designed a geodesic dome that is resilient to harsh weather conditions.
    Completed the design and execution of six interior projects in just two months.

  • 2023 July - 2024

    Freelance Architect

    Successfully completed designing five residential apartments along with one commercial bakery.

); }; export default About;
